Web Development

Between the initial spark of inspiration and the final launch of a fully functional website, a number of essential steps must occur to turn your organization’s dream into reality. Those colorful layouts and interactive features depend on careful preparation, precise coding, exquisite design, creative writing and other detailed development stages. If you want to make sure that your website will fulfill your needs and goals, you’ll want to hand your web development challenges to the experts at Brightscout.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”/contact/” button_text=”Let’s Get Started” _builder_version=”3.19.7″ custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#ffffff” button_bg_use_color_gradient=”on” button_bg_color_gradient_start=”#5DE455″ button_bg_color_gradient_end=”#14C0AA” button_bg_color_gradient_direction=”210deg” button_border_width=”0px” button_letter_spacing=”1px” button_font=”|600||on|||||” button_use_icon=”off” custom_margin=”64px||” custom_padding=”20px|72px|20px|72px” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_vertical=”26px” box_shadow_blur=”92px” box_shadow_spread=”3px” box_shadow_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.2)” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”center_left” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ animation_style=”fade” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”|700||on|||||” text_text_color=”#54b454″ text_font_size=”20px” text_letter_spacing=”2.5px” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||8px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Powerful web experiences

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_2_font=”||||||||” header_2_font_size=”48px” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Weaving the Strands of a Powerful, Beautiful Website

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider divider_weight=”4px” _builder_version=”3.19.7″ max_width=”8%” module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” custom_margin=”24px||32px” animation_style=”slide” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”20px” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Brightscout brings a skilled, experienced team of strategists, designers and programmers to your web development project. The success of any kind of structural build begins with a sound blueprint for success. In addition to drawing up a requirements analysis, project charter and site map for the project, our team will prepare the necessary contract documentation to clarify everything from milestones and deadlines to payment terms and intellectual property ownership. We will also gather whatever kinds of software, data files, and media resources we may need to implement your vision.

Once we’ve planned the site and gathered our tools, it’s time for the actual build. We use popular front-end programming solutions such as React.js for front-end coding, with back-end solutions such as Node.js (for Javascript elements) and Ruby on Rails (ideal for highly-scalable web applications). At the same time, we create wireframes and mock-ups containing the written content and visual elements established during your project’s strategy and design stages.
